benchmark_details.name: Construction Safety Dataset (CSDataset)
benchmark_details.overview: The Construction Safety Dataset (CSDataset) is a comprehensive multi-level dataset encompassing incidents, inspections, and violations sourced from the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), designed for construction safety research, enabling a wide range of machine learning and large language model analyses.
benchmark_details.data_type: multi-level records including incidents, inspections, and violations

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation resource for machine learning and large language models to enhance safety management in the construction industry through data-driven methods.

methodology.calculation: Evaluated model performance based on precision, recall, F1-score, and overall accuracy using cross-validation.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better predictive ability in classifying incident severity.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4.1-mini achieved an F1-score of 0.820 in injury severity prediction.
methodology.validation: Employing cross-validation techniques to ensure reliability of findings.
